When Lambo?   Smart contracts and scaling will come in 2020. The business can test #Cardano in 2021/22 and it takes years. We can see the first killer app in 2021.  The $ADA will rise with adoption and it is a bigger certainty than speculation.  #blockchain $btc $eth $eos  https://t.co/yrgDlaM4wi

When mass adoption?  The sad truth, people do not care about decentralization much.   Something must be faster, cheaper, more effective, accessible, secure or transparent. #Cardano has the potential to satisfy people's expectations in the real world.  #blockchain $ada $btc $eth  https://t.co/EXkqdcuaQX
See $ADA added what were you all worrying about?! Not me 😎

Google announced a new quantum computer.  I am not afraid. Still, the best protection for your $ADA is to keep coins on more addresses from which no transaction has been sent out. Thus the keys are not revealed and attackers have no chance.  #blockchain #Cardano $btc $eth $eos  https://t.co/3RrYJyW7oj
